Control Name: Considers Various Types of Fraud—The assessment of fraud considers fraudulent reporting, possible loss of assets, and corruption resulting from the various ways that fraud and misconduct can occur.

control_attributes.Control: Considers Various Types of Fraud—The assessment of fraud considers fraudulent reporting, possible loss of assets, and corruption resulting from the various ways that fraud and misconduct can occur.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.3 COSO Principle 8: The entity considers the potential for fraud in assessing risks to the achievement of objectives
